javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GameViewController extends GUIController implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the GUI during the game

      Initializes the game scene
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - the location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resourceBundle - the resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.

      Draws the drawable cards in the common table
      Parameters:
      resourceDeck - card on top of the resource deck
      goldDeck - card on top of the gold deck
      card0 - first card in the common table
      card1 - second card in the common table
      card2 - third card in the common table
      card3 - fourth card in the common table

    • drawPoints

      public void drawPoints(String player, int points)
      Moves the player's pawn in the correct position on the score board
      Parameters:
      player - nickname of a player who scored those points
      points - updated points of the player

    • drawBoard

      public void drawBoard(PlayableCard[][] board, String player)
      Draws the updated board of a certain player
      Parameters:
      board - matrix which contains the card already placed
      player - nickname of the player who placed a card

    • drawChat

      public void drawChat(ArrayList<Text> chat, String player)
      Draw latest text message received or sent by this player
      Parameters:
      chat - all text messages that includes the player as sender or receiver
      player - local player associated to the view

    • drawButtons

      public void drawButtons(ArrayList<String> players, String player)
      Draws chat buttons and boards' buttons, on which a player can click a see another player's board
      Parameters:
      players - turn order of the game
      player - nickname of the local player for which a certain button's configuration is drawn

    • restoreChat

      public void restoreChat(ArrayList<Text> chat, String player)
      Draws the old text messages in the private chats and in the group chat after a player rejoined the game
      Parameters:
      chat - list of all text messages where the player is the recipient or the sender
      player - the rejoined player
